DOC.brief_summary: Rationale : Forced spirometry maneuver routinely perform patient Ataxia Telangiectasia ( A-T ) , even though suffer respiratory illness . Objectives : To study feasibility validity force spirometry A-T patient . Methods : Patients perform spirometry clinical visit . Parameters study technical quality , relation predict value , age , pulmonary illness , body mass index , mutational status mutation .
DOC.brief_title: The Validity Forced Expiratory Maneuvers Ataxia Telangiectasia Studied Longitudinally
DOC.criteria: Patients proven Ataxia Telangiectasia inability perform spirometry
